Package com.mimecast.robin.mx.config

Class Config

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mx.config.Config
public class Config extends Object
Config.

Gives fine control over validations.

Author:
"Vlad Marian" (vmarian@mimecast.com)

    • policyMaxBodySize

      Policy max body size (64k).

    • policyMaxAge

      private int policyMaxAge
      Policy max age.

      365.25 days / ~ 1 year.

    • policyMinAge

      private int policyMinAge
      Policy min age.

      7 days / 1 week.

    • policySoftMinAge

      private int policySoftMinAge
      Policy soft min age.

      1 day.

    • fetchRptRecord

      protected boolean fetchRptRecord
      Fetch RPT record.
